title: Amazing Stories Volume 09 Number 11
creator: Sloane, Thomas O'Conor, 1851-1940
Kostkos, Henry J., 1900-1977

Campbell, John Wood, 1910-1971
Breuer, Miles John, 1889-1945

Repp, Edward Earl, 1900-1979
description: Amazing Stories, volume 9, number 11 (March 1935). Scanned copy of a pulp magazine published by Teck Publications, Inc. and edited by Thomas O'Conor Sloane, Ph.D. Periodical copyright not renewed. Individual contributions' copyrights not renewed. This magazine and its contents are now in the public domain. Featuring: Earth Rehabilitators, Consolidated (Henry J. Kostkos; 1/2), Interference (Max C. Sheridan), The Conquest of the Planets (John W. Campbell, Jr.; 3/3), Millions for Defense (Miles J. Breuer), Zora of the Zoromes (Neil R. Jones), and The Body Pirate (Ed Earl Repp).
